name: Volley
headline: Voice AI games on smart speakers, TVs, and mobile
description:
Volley builds the best voice AI games and entertainment experiences for Amazon Alexa, smartphones, and TVs.

Popular Volley voice games include “Song Quiz”, “Jeopardy!”, and “The Price Is Right”.

Our voice apps are used by millions of people every month. We believe voice control will become the main way people access entertainment in their bedrooms, kitchens, living rooms, and cars, and our goal is to become the "Netflix of Voice" for this emerging category of devices.

Volley was founded by Max Child and James Wilsterman in 2016. We're a hybrid remote/in-person company, headquartered in San Francisco.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:speech-recognition; industry:entertainment; industry:gaming; industry:nlp; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Max Child, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Co-founded Volley, providers of premier voice-controlled entertainment on Alexa, smart TV, and mobile devices.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Volley**

Founded in 2016 by Max Child and James Wilsterman, Volley is carving out a significant niche in the entertainment sector by leveraging voice AI technology. Based in San Francisco and operating as a hybrid remote/in-person workplace, Volley is part of the prestigious Y Combinator Batch W18. The company has grown to a robust team of 80 employees under the guidance of Group Partner Nan.

**Mission and Vision**

Volley aims to be the "Netflix of Voice," empowering users to engage with entertainment through smart speakers, TVs, and mobile devices. They believe that as voice control becomes the primary interface for accessing entertainment in everyday settings—the bedroom, kitchen, living room, and even the car—their innovative offerings will lead the way in this new landscape of interactive entertainment.

**Popular Products**

Volley has developed a variety of voice-controlled games that are already popular among millions of users. Notable titles include:

- **Song Quiz**: Test your music knowledge.
- **Jeopardy!**: The classic trivia game where you guess questions based on given answers.
- **The Price Is Right**: A fun take on estimating product prices.
- **Wheel of Fortune**: Solve word puzzles by spinning the wheel.
- **Karaoke**: Show off your singing skills.
- **Who Wants to Be a Millionaire**: Hit the hot seat for a chance at trivia glory.
- **Bedtime Stories**: Over 400 soothing stories to help ease into sleep.

These games are accessible through platforms like Amazon Alexa and various smart TV applications, reflecting Volley’s commitment to a wide user reach.

**Market Position**

Volley positions itself at the intersection of artificial intelligence, speech recognition, gaming, and entertainment, tagging itself across these domains. This strategic focus allows them to tap into current trends in consumer technology and entertainment, helping them meet evolving user needs.

**Looking Ahead**

Volley is not just about creating games; it’s about reimagining the way people interact with entertainment. As they continue to expand their portfolio, their vision of becoming the go-to platform for voice-controlled entertainment seems more achievable than ever.

For more details about their games and vision, visit their [website](https://volleygames.com).
